data.feedback: Architecture perfectly matches existing codebase patterns. Stories are well-structured with clear dependencies, detailed technical guidance, and testable acceptance criteria. Minor metadata inconsistency in filesToModify vs filesToCreate at epic level doesn't block implementation.

issues.description: Epic metadata lists ios/android platform files in filesToModify but they don't exist yet
issues.resolution: Story 1 correctly has them in filesToCreate - this is just metadata inconsistency

suggestions: Update epic-level filesToModify to move platform files to filesToCreate for consistency
Story 1 should explicitly verify epic-flutter-platform-setup completed first
